Interface ProductRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Product,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Product,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Product,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Product,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Product,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Product>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Product,Long>
@Repository public interface ProductRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Product,Long>
ProductRepository is a Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing Product entities. It provides methods to perform CRUD operations and custom queries on the product data.

  • Method Details

    • fetchAllProductsWithName

      List<Product> fetchAllProductsWithName(String name)
      Fetches all products that match the specified name using a named query.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the products to search for
      Returns:
      a list of products that match the specified name

    • findByColor

      Finds products by their color.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to filter products by
      Returns:
      a list of products that match the specified color

    • fetchAllProductsWithName

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> fetchAllProductsWithName(String name, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Fetches all products that match the specified name with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the products to search for
      pageable - pagination information including page number and size
      Returns:
      a Page containing products that match the specified name
